Tests Page.setFontFamilies() for 'standard'.
.test
[
    [0] : {
        familyName : Ahem (Fontations)
        glyphCount : 8
        isCustomFont : false
        postScriptName : Ahem
    }
]
Tests Page.setFontFamilies() for 'serif'.
.test
[
    [0] : {
        familyName : Ahem (Fontations)
        glyphCount : 5
        isCustomFont : false
        postScriptName : Ahem
    }
]

.test

        glyphCount : 9
        isCustomFont : false
        postScriptName : Ahem
    }
]
